speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Karen from Rapid Collections. Am I speaking with Tom?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling about your overdue balance. Look, Tom, this delay is fucking unacceptable. Can you please confirm your address?

speaker: Agent
text: Thanks. You owe $275. When are you planning to pay?

speaker: Customer
text: I'll try to arrange a payment soon.

speaker: Agent
text: Make sure you do, or I'll have to escalate this shit.

speaker: Agent
text: Good. I'll follow up shortly. Goodbye.
